briefTitle: Study in Participants With Early-Stage or Locally Advanced Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor (HER) 2-Positive and Estrogen Receptor/Progesterone Receptor Negative Breast Cancer to Evaluate the Efficiency and Safety of Treatment With Trastuzumab Plus (+) QL1209/Pertuzumab + Docetaxel.
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Parallel-Controlled, Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate QL1209/Pertuzumab in Combination With Docetaxel in Patients With Early-Stage or Locally Advanced HER2-Positive and ER/PR-negative Breast Cancer.
